definition: The art of dealing with people in a sensitive and effective way
Causing great damage or hardship
A lack of compatibility or similarity between two or more facts
Disperse or scatter
Characteristic of one person or thing, and so serving to distinguish it
The state of being diverse; variety
Deriving ideas, style, or taste from a broad and diverse range of sources
Vivacious and enthusiastic
To develop or present (a theory, policy, or system) in detail
Fluent or persuasive in speaking or writing
Cause (someone) to feel awkward, self-conscious, or ashamed

Having or showing intense and eager enjoyment

A state in which opposing forces or influences are balanced
Equal in value, amount, function, meaning, etc.
Remove (someone) from a place of danger to a safer place
Represent (something) as being larger, better, or worse than it really is
Irritate and frustrate (someone) intensely
Make (someone) feel very happy, animated, or elated
